overview: Testimonials from important people in the social movement bring up reflections on gender, sexuality, and human rights. Always bearing in mind the roles that language plays in the production and maintenance of violence. Bringing together reflections on empowerment, discourse, body, desire, sexism, gender identity, sexual orientation, transfeminism, and homotransphobia, the documentary interviews important personalities when it comes to the LGBT movement and human rights, such as João W. Nery, Amelinha Teles, and Luana Hansen, among others.
title: Vozeria
